description.value:
You gain one of the benefits described below, depending on your choice of Rogue Tactics. Your choice also provides additional benefits to certain rogue powers, as detailed in those powers' descriptions.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.uzrO6f4MU1iN5B9g]{Artful Dodger}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.kRxOtK0zeDNHmaLT]{Brutal Scoundrel}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.Fti1kryULjs40TME]{Cunning Sneak}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.VReIMOaBAbnF5sEy]{Ruthless Ruffian}
